content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 41}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a magenta_banner, I first need to craft 6 magenta_wools. To craft magenta_wool, I need to craft magenta_dye, which requires me to craft blue_dye and red_dye. To craft blue_dye, I can use the squid_spawn_egg in my inventory. Therefore, I will start by moving the squid_spawn_egg to the crafting grid so I can spawn squids.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 41}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]
thought: I can now craft birch_planks from the birch_wood in my inventory. I will move the birch_planks to a free inventory slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 52, "index": 41}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}, {"type": "squid_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a magenta_banner, I first need to craft 6 magenta_wool. To do this, I need to place 1 magenta_dye and 1 white_wool in the crafting grid. The magenta dye can be crafted by combining 1 blue dye and 1 pink dye. To craft the pink dye, I will need to move the birch planks to the crafting grid to make sticks.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

I could either craft them from white_wool and magenta_dye or use the magenta_dye to craft pink_dye and then combine it with purple_dye to get magenta_dye. However, I don't have any purple_dye so I'll craft magenta_wool instead. To do that, I need to move a magenta_dye to the crafting grid.
Ok
